messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] was: Red heads and Is It Normal?, now genetics, adoption
messages.msgSnippet: I have a sister from my mom s first marriage and a brother from my dad s first mariage. My sister looks like my mom and my brother looks like my dad. My sister
messages.messageBody:
I have a sister from my mom's first marriage and a brother from my dad's
first mariage. My sister looks like my mom and my brother looks like my dad.
My sister lived with my parents until she was 19 and my brother lived with
his mom. Neither one of them are anything like me at all in no way shape or
form. Aside from looks, I don't see much at all that is like either one of
my parents.

My oldest has been raised by my husband since she was 4. He thinks of her as
his. She also has frequent contact with her dad. The similarities between my
daughter and my husband are sometimes scary. He still jokes that she really
is his and we had a fling a long time ago!!! Of course she is like her dad
too, but so many things are like my husband, most people have no clue. She
also looks very much like me where my other 3 kids look like my husband.
Hey, at least I got one that resembles me!!!

Mary B
